channel.title: My Doggy Advisor Blog
channel.description: A personal blog that aims to help dog owners to understand the tons of information available about dogs and summarize them in easy to understand pages.

item.title: Best Dog Food | My Doggy Advisor
item.description: This simple dog food buying guide helps to understand how to choose the best food for your dog and gives you my top choices for 11 most popular categories.

item.title: Grain-Free Dog Food and Dilated Cardiomyopathy | My Doggy Advisor
item.description: The FDA has been studying the effects of grain-free dog foods and their potential link to heart disease. This article summarizes the key points of the study.

item.title: How to Leave Your Dog At Home Alone | My Doggy Advisor
item.description: This short guide will help you learn how to leave your dog at home without having to worry about what youâ€™ll find when you get back.

item.title: How Much Chicken And Rice Should You Feed Your Sick Dog | My Doggy Advisor
item.description: One of the most recommended ways to help sick dogs recover is to feed them a diet with chicken and rice. But how much chicken and rice for dogs is acceptable?

item.title: Best Interactive Dog Toys | My Doggy Advisor
item.description: Interactive dog toys help your dog to enjoy being alone at home while, and at the same time great for their mental and cognitive development.

item.title: 10 Ways to Keep Your Puppy Cool in Summer | My Doggy Advisor
item.description: Summer presents the perfect weather to head to the beach and enjoy outdoors with your puppy. This article offers few tips to make it safer for your dog.
